channel.title: Cannot find symbol?
channel.description: Hi everyone, I'm trying to add a hide and seek minigame to my server (The one that mrjad created) but I get 3 cannot find symbol errors when I already declared the thing. Here are my errors: [code] client.java:17792: cannot find symbol symbol : variable InHS location: class client InHS = true; ^ client.java:17801: cannot find symbol symbol : variable InHS location: class client if(PlayerHandler.hsnpc == 1 && InHS && PlayerHandler.npchs == 1){ ^ client.java:17802: cannot find symbol symbol : variable InHS location: class client InHS = false; ^ 3 errors Finished! Press any key to continue . . .[/code] And here is what i declared: [code] public boolean isInHS() { if((absX >= 2366 && absX <= 2433 && absY >= 3070 && absY <=3137)) return true; else return false; }[/code]

item.title: Cannot find symbol?
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

I did that but now I get 2 errors

client.java:17792: unexpected type required: variable found : value isInHS() = true; ^ client.java:17802: unexpected type required: variable found : value isInHS() = false; ^ 2 errors Finished! Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic
